## IDictionary.getAssociation() method

Retrieves an association definition by it's qname

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAssociation(qname: QNameWithTypeTagConsumer<QNameTypeTag.ASSOCIATION>): AssociationDefinition | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  qname | QNameWithTypeTagConsumer&lt;QNameTypeTag.ASSOCIATION&gt; | The qualified name of the association to fetch |

<b>Returns:</b>

AssociationDefinition \| null

An association definition, or null when no association exists for the requested qname
